messages.subject: Scans of Nishi Hongwanji's Drum Tower at Photos
messages.msgSnippet: Hi minna, I ve uploaded some scans concerning the Nishi Hongwanji s Drum Tower, where the Shinsengumi moved into in 1865. You will find the informative scans
messages.messageBody:
Hi minna,

I've uploaded some scans concerning the Nishi Hongwanji's Drum Tower,
where the Shinsengumi moved into in 1865. You will find the informative
scans at the Photos section. I hope you will enjoy.

Nana
